郲字的基本解释

郲
lái
古国名，中国春秋时被齐所灭。故地在今山东省龙口市莱子城一带。亦作“莱”。
古地名，中国春秋时属郑，在今河南省荥阳县东厘城旧址。
姓。

郲字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lái］
［《廣韻》落哀切，平咍，來。］
(1)古地名。春秋郑地。故址在今河南省郑州市西北。
(2)古国名。即莱国，齐灭以为邑。当在今山东省昌县东南。

郲字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【邑字部】　郲； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1273第20
【廣韻】落哀切【集韻】郞才切，?音來。地名。【春秋·隱十一年】公會鄭伯于時來。【註】時來，郲也。滎陽縣東有釐城，鄭地也。　又山名。【前漢·王尊傳】行部至卭郲。【註】卭郲，山名也，在蜀郡嚴道縣。　又【廣韻】落猥切，音磥。?郲，不平貌。

考證：〔【左傳·隱十一年】公會鄭伯于時來。【註】時來，郲也。滎陽縣東有郲城，鄭地也。〕　謹照原文左傳改春秋。郲城改釐城。
郲字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体旧字形
郲字的起名意思

暂无。

郲
Basic explanation of words
郲
lái
The name of the ancient country was destroyed by Qi in the Spring and Autumn Period of China. The old place was in the area of Laizicheng, Longkou City, Shandong Province. Also known as "Lai".
The ancient place name belonged to Zheng in the Spring and Autumn Period of China. It is in the former site of Dongli City, Xingyang County, Henan Province.
name.
郲
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lái］
["Guangyun" fell mourning and cut, flat 咍, come. ]
(1) Ancient place names. Chunqiu Zhengdi. The former site was in the northwest of Zhengzhou City, Henan Province.
(2) Ancient country name. That is, the country of Lai, Qi Mie thinks that it is a town. It was in the southeast of Changxian County, Shandong Province.
郲
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 2] [Yi Zi Department] 　郲; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1273 No. 20
[Guang Yun] Lao Ai and cut [Ji Yun] Yan Cai cut, and the sound comes. Place name. [Spring and Autumn · Eleventh Year of Hidden] Uncle Zheng from the guild came at the time. [Note] When the time comes, Chen Ye. There is Licheng in the east of Xingyang County, and Zhengdi also.　Also the name of the mountain. [Previous Han·Wang Zun Biography] Xingbu to Shaoyun. [Note] Shaoyun, the name of the mountain, is in Yandao County, Shu County.　[Guangyun] It's falling and cutting, and the sound is dying.郲, ugly. Textual research: [[Zuo Zhuan·Hidden Eleven Years] Uncle Zheng from the guild at Shilai. [Note] When the time comes, Chen Ye. In the east of Xingyang County, there is Chencheng and Zhengdi. 〕 　 I would like to change the Spring and Autumn Period according to the original Zuo Zhuan. Chencheng changed to Licheng.
